feed.title: Audioling Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Audioling: audioling v0.1.0
entry.content:
Welcome to the v0.1.0 release of audioling!

This is a feature-limited release, so that you can get your hands on audioling to begin testing out features such as the drag/drop UX, track querying, and the priority queue mode. This release only contains support for (Open)Subsonic servers, with Jellyfin coming soon (tbd).

A breakdown of completed and in-progress features and pages are listed here. Docker builds will be provided in a later release.

I encourage everyone to attempt to break the app and submit a bug report if you do.

Feature requests are also now formally open. If you have already submitted an idea in the discussions, please do not open a duplicate. I will be converting them to feature request issues in the near future.
